name: nw_multipath_service_t
desc: Modes in which a connection can support multipath protocols.

items.name: var nw_multipath_service_handover: nw_multipath_service_t
items.desc: Enable multipath, but only use other interfaces when the primary interface is lost.

items.name: var nw_multipath_service_interactive: nw_multipath_service_t
items.desc: Enable multipath to use other interfaces when the primary interface encounters loss or delay.

items.name: var nw_multipath_service_aggregate: nw_multipath_service_t
items.desc: Enable multipath to maximize bandwidth across multiple interfaces.
